login_troubleshooting.title: Login Issues
common_errors: If you forget your password, click 'Şifremi Unuttum' (Forgot Password). The system will email your registered address.
You can also log in via E-Devlet using the 'E-Devlet İle Giriş' button.
login_troubleshooting.first_login: If logging in for the first time or if your password contains part of your TR ID, you will be forced to change your password immediately.

how_to_view_grades.title: Viewing Grades (Not Listesi)
steps: Navigate to 'Ders ve Dönem İşlemleri' (Course & Term Operations) > 'Not Listesi' (Grade List).
Select the relevant Term (Dönem) from the filter.
The screen lists your Midterm, Final, and Make-up grades for each course.
Click the 'Statistics' button to see class averages and grade distributions.

how_to_view_gpa.title: Viewing GPA and Term Averages
steps: Navigate to 'Ders ve Dönem İşlemleri' (Course & Term Operations) > 'Dönem Ortalamaları' (Term Averages).
This screen displays your Taken Course Count, Total Credits, Total ECTS, Term Average, and General Average (AGNO/GPA).
Graphs at the bottom of the page visualize your GPA trends over semesters.

how_to_view_transcript.title: Viewing Transcript
steps: Navigate to 'Ders ve Dönem İşlemleri' > 'Transkript'.
This page displays all courses taken, grouped by semester, with Grades, Credits, and ECTS.
Click the 'Yazdır' (Print) button to download or print your official transcript.
For a 'What-If' scenario, go to 'Transkript Senaryosu' to simulate how new grades would affect your GPA.

how_to_check_attendance.title: Checking Attendance (Devamsızlık Durumu)
steps: Navigate to 'Ders ve Dönem İşlemleri' > 'Devamsızlık Durumu'.
Select the term to view attendance records.
Click the 'i' (info) icon under 'Ders Devam Kuralları' to see the specific theory/practice attendance requirements for a course.

course_registration_procedure.title: Course Registration (Ders Kayıt)
steps: Log in and go to 'Ders ve Dönem İşlemleri' > 'Ders Kayıt'.
Click the '+' button next to a course in the curriculum list to add it.
If a course has a blinking '!' icon, it has not been opened by the department yet.
To drop a selected course, click the 'Trash Can' (Çıkar) icon.
To replace a course (count-as/saydırma), click the 'Link/Switch' (Saydır) icon.
Click 'Kontrol Et' (Check) to validate your list against rules.
Finally, click 'Kesinleştir' (Finalize) to send it for Advisor Approval.
statuses: Kesinleştirildi: You have finalized your choices.
Kesinleştirilmedi: You have NOT finalized yet.

add_drop_procedure.title: Add/Drop (Ders Ekle/Bırak)
add_drop_procedure.description: Used during the specific Add/Drop period to modify your schedule.
steps: Navigate to 'Ders ve Dönem İşlemleri' > 'Ders Ekle/Bırak'.
Use the '+' button to add new courses.
Use the 'Bırak' (Drop) button next to 'Selected Courses' to drop an existing one.
After changes, check the 'Student Finalization Status'. If finalized, it goes to the advisor.
Advisor Approval Status: 'Onaylandı' (Approved) or 'Onaylanmadı' (Not Approved).

exam_schedule.title: Exam Schedule (Sınav Takvimi)
steps: Navigate to 'Genel İşlemler' (General Operations) > 'Sınav Takvimi'.
Filter by the current term.
A blinking '!' icon indicates a special note regarding that specific exam.

internship_procedures.title: Internship Information (Staj Bilgileri)
steps: Navigate to 'Genel İşlemler' > 'Staj Bilgileri'.
This screen shows the Start Date, End Date, Duration (days), and Acceptance Status (Kabul Durumu/Gün) of your internships.

graduation_procedures.title: Graduation Approval (Mezuniyet Onay Birimleri)
steps: Navigate to 'Genel İşlemler' > 'Mezuniyet Onay Birimleri'.
This screen is for students in 'Graduation Status'.
You can track online approvals from various units (Library, Student Affairs, etc.) for your departure procedures.

messaging_procedures.title: Messages (Gelen/Gönderilen Mesajlar)
steps: Navigate to 'Kullanıcı İşlemleri' > 'Gelen Mesajlar' (Inbox) or 'Gönderilen Mesajlar' (Sent).
You can send messages to: Advisor, Second Advisor, Course Instructors.
You can attach files using the 'Dosya Eki' feature.
Unread messages have a specific icon. Opened messages show the read time.

document_request.title: Requesting Documents
steps: Navigate to 'Kullanıcı İşlemleri' > 'Belge Talebi'.
Select the document type (e.g., Student Certificate) from 'Belge Türü'.
You can track the status of your request on this same screen.

password_change_rules.title: Password Rules & Change
steps: Navigate to 'Kullanıcı İşlemleri' > 'Şifre Değiştir'.
Enter Old Password, New Password, and Confirm New Password.
Check the 'Commitment Text' box and click 'Kaydet'.
rules: Must contain at least one uppercase letter.
Must contain at least one number.
Numbers or letters cannot be sequential (e.g., 123, abc).
Characters cannot repeat more than twice (e.g., cannot use 'AAA').

photo_update_rules.title: Photo Update (Fotoğraf Güncelle)
steps: Navigate to 'Kullanıcı İşlemleri' > 'Fotoğraf Güncelle'.
Click 'Dosya Seç' to upload a new photo.
Click 'Yükle'. The photo must be approved by the Department Secretary or Student Affairs.
photo_update_rules.requirements: File must be .JPG format and maximum 2MB size.

personal_info_page.title: Personal Information (Özlük Bilgileri)
personal_info_page.description: View and update your contact details.
steps: Navigate to 'Genel İşlemler' > 'Özlük Bilgileri'.
Update your address or phone number if changed.
Click 'Kaydet' to save changes.

opened_courses_page.title: Opened Department Courses (Açılan Bölüm Dersleri)
opened_courses_page.description: List of courses available in the current semester.
steps: Navigate to 'Genel İşlemler' > 'Açılan Bölüm Dersleri'.
View the list of courses with their Class, Theory (T), Practice (U), Lab (L), and ECTS details.

fees_info.title: Tuition Fees (Harç Bilgileri)
steps: Navigate to 'Genel İşlemler' > 'Harç Bilgileri'.
View 'Topam Ücret' (Total Fee/Debt) and 'Ödenen Toplam Ücret' (Total Paid).
